pr_title: WFLY-10612 Include EJB's IIOP Binding when EJB is deployed logging

timeline.author: bstansberry
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -121,6 +121,12 @@
      */
     EjbLogger DEPLOYMENT_LOGGER = Logger.getMessageLogger(EjbLogger.class, "org.jboss.as.ejb3.deployment");
 
+    /**
+     * A logger with the category {@code org.jboss.as.ejb3.iiop} used for deployment
+     * log messages
+     */
+    EjbLogger IIOP_DEPLOYMENT_LOGGER = Logger.getMessageLogger(EjbLogger.class, "org.jboss.as.ejb3.iiop");

replies.bodyText: Thanks, Brian. I have changed accordingly.
replies.author: RanabirChakraborty

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/ejb3/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/ejb3/logging/EjbLogger.java b/ejb3/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/ejb3/logging/EjbLogger.java
index 84ce39bbb3..70483b9ad5 100644
--- a/ejb3/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/ejb3/logging/EjbLogger.java
+++ b/ejb3/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/ejb3/logging/EjbLogger.java

@@ -121,12 +121,6 @@ public interface EjbLogger extends BasicLogger {
      */
     EjbLogger DEPLOYMENT_LOGGER = Logger.getMessageLogger(EjbLogger.class, "org.jboss.as.ejb3.deployment");
 
-    /**
-     * A logger with the category {@code org.jboss.as.ejb3.iiop} used for deployment
-     * log messages
-     */
-    EjbLogger IIOP_DEPLOYMENT_LOGGER = Logger.getMessageLogger(EjbLogger.class, "org.jboss.as.ejb3.iiop");
-
     /**
      * A logger with the category {@code org.jboss.as.ejb3.remote} used for remote log messages
      */

timeline.message: WFLY-10612 Include EJB's IIOP Binding when EJB is deployed logging

timeline.bodyText:
Just some minor style issues: either use final for all 3 params or no final.
ComponentName -> componentName, the same for other 2 params.
timeline.author: chengfang
